channel.title: Simone Salsi ( thedos )
channel.description: Recent content on Simone Salsi ( thedos )

item.description: Bio I’m a passionate software and system developer, thrilled by cutting-edge technologies, fast to acquire domain knowledge, productive from the beginning and obsessed by internals. With more than 10 years of experience, in these last 5 years I dedicated myself entirely to cloud native solutions. I’m obsessed with Kubernetes, microservices, event driven architectures, Kafka and NoSQL datastores. I love learning new stuff and share knowledge with others, experimenting whenever possible embracing a fail fast / recover quickly approach.

Public Keys In this section you can find my public keys, please feel free to use them while getting in contact with me. My public key ID is: 0x8B02A2057D524749. You can download the key here. I strongly support the use of encrypted email, would you like to know more?
